name: Virgin Pina Colada Protein Smoothie

directions: 1. Place chocolate drink mix, soy milk, ice, peanut butter syrup, and peanut butter powder in a blender cup and blend until smooth.
ingredients: 1 packet CARNATION BREAKFAST ESSENTIALS® Rich Milk Chocolate Powdered Drink Mix, ¾ cup soy milk, ¾ cup ice, 2 tablespoons sugar-free peanut butter syrup, 2 tablespoons peanut butter powder
name: Carnation Breakfast Peanut Butter Cup Smoothie

directions: 1. Place the milk, yogurt, banana, instant oatmeal, sweetener, and ice cubes into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.
ingredients: 1 ¼ cups milk, ¼ cup vanilla yogurt, 1 banana, broken into chunks, 1 packet peaches and cream flavor instant oatmeal, 2 packets granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (such as Splenda®) (Optional), 5 ice cubes
name: Peaches 'N Cream Banana Breakfast Smoothie

directions: 1. Add spinach leaves to a blender and finely chop. Add berry juice, blueberries, sour cream, sugar, blackberries, and ice cubes. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately or refrigerate for later.
ingredients: 1 cup baby spinach leaves, 1 cup acai juice, ½ cup blueberries, 2 tablespoons light sour cream, 2 tablespoons white sugar, or more to taste, 2 tablespoons blackberries, 8 ice cubes
name: Spinach-Berry Smoothie

directions: 1. Blend 1/2 banana, peaches, applesauce, water, and coconut oil together in a blender until smooth; pour into a serving bowl. 2. Slice remaining half banana and arrange on top of smoothie. Add shredded coconut, almonds, and raisins.
ingredients: 1 banana, divided, ½ cup frozen peach slices, 2 tablespoons unsweetened applesauce, 2 tablespoons water, 2 teaspoons coconut oil, 1 tablespoon shredded unsweetened coconut, 1 tablespoon sliced almonds, 1 tablespoon raisins
name: Banana Coconut Smoothie Bowl

directions: 1. Combine yogurt, mango chunks, mango juice, honey, vanilla extract, ground cardamom, ground cinnamon, and ground ginger in a blender; process until liquefied.
ingredients: 1 cup nonfat plain yogurt, 1 cup frozen mango chunks, ¼ cup mango juice, 2 tablespoons honey, ½ teaspoon vanilla extract, ¼ teaspoon ground cardamom, ⅛ teaspoon ground cinnamon, ⅛ teaspoon ground ginger
name: Spiced Mango Lassi

directions: 1. Blend soy milk, yogurt, green tea powder, and ice in a blender on high until ice is entirely crushed, about 1 minute.
ingredients: 1 cup low-fat soy milk, ½ cup low-fat vanilla Greek-style yogurt, ¾ teaspoon green tea powder (matcha), 3 cubes ice, or as needed
name: Matcha Madness

directions: 1. Blend the mango, brown sugar, chopped mint, star anise, cardamom, lime juice, and yogurt in a blender on high speed until smooth. Pour into glasses and garnish with fresh mint sprigs to serve.
ingredients: 1 large mango - peeled, seeded, and diced, 3 tablespoons brown sugar, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint, 1 teaspoon freshly ground star anise, 1 teaspoon freshly ground cardamom, 1 tablespoon lime juice, 2 cups plain yogurt, 3 sprigs fresh mint for garnish
name: Mango-Mint Lassi with Indian Sweet Spices

directions: 1. In a blender, combine orange juice concentrate, milk, sugar, vanilla and ice cubes. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, 1 ½ cups milk, ½ cup sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 10 cubes ice
name: Orange Slush

directions: 1. Combine all ingredients in a blender and process until smooth.
ingredients: 1 cup Silk® Vanilla Coconutmilk, ¼ cup freshly squeezed orange juice, 1 cup fresh or frozen pitted sweet cherries, 1 tablespoon honey or agave, 1 cup ice
name: Very Cherry Smoothie

directions: 1. Combine mango chunks, lemon, spinach, zucchini, water, ice cubes, and coconut oil in a high-speed blender; blend until smooth.
ingredients: 1 cup frozen mango chunks, ½ lemon, peeled, 1 cup fresh spinach, ¼ unpeeled zucchini, chopped, ¾ cup water, 4 ice cubes, or more to taste, 1 tablespoon coconut oil, melted
name: Lemon Coconut Cleanser

directions: 1. Place the mango and papaya into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth; add the orange juice, lime juice, sugar, orange zest, and water. Blend well. Serve over crushed ice.
ingredients: 1 cup sliced mango, 1 cup diced, peeled papaya, 1 cup orange juice, ¼ cup lime juice, ¼ cup white sugar, or to taste, 1 teaspoon grated orange zest, 4 cups water
name: Pawpaw (Papaya) And Mango Punch

directions: 1. Place banana, banana extract, milk, yogurt, and sugar into a blender. Blend until smooth and serve.
ingredients: 1 banana, broken into chunks, 1 teaspoon banana extract, ¾ cup milk, 1 (8 ounce) container strawberry yogurt, 2 teaspoons white sugar
name: Banana Banana Strawberry Smoothie

directions: 1. Blend mango, bananas, coconut milk, water, ice, sugar, coconut extract, and lime zest in a blender until smooth.
ingredients: 1 mango - peeled, seeded, and chopped, 1 ½ frozen bananas, sliced, ½ cup coconut milk, ½ cup cold water, 4 cubes ice, or as needed, 1 tablespoon white sugar, 1 teaspoon coconut extract, ½ teaspoon lime zest
name: Coconut Banango Smoothie

directions: 1. Blend pineapple juice, yogurt, strawberries, and banana together in a blender until smooth.
ingredients: ½ cup pineapple juice, ½ cup plain low-fat yogurt, ½ cup halved strawberries, 1 banana (Optional)
name: Creamy Strawberry-Pineapple Smoothie

directions: 1. Combine almond milk, avocado, and honey in a blender; blend until smooth.
ingredients: 12 fluid ounces unsweetened almond milk, 1 avocado, peeled and pitted, 1 tablespoon honey
name: Avocado Smoothie

directions: 1. Break open the sapote and pull out the pulp. Discard seeds and skin. 2. Combine sapote, ice, and almond milk in a blender; blend until smooth.
ingredients: 1 black sapote, ice, 1 cup chocolate-flavored almond milk
name: Chocolate Sapote Smoothie

directions: 1. Combine soy milk, spinach, protein powder, mint leaves, almonds, and ice in a blender cup; blend until smooth.
ingredients: ½ cup soy milk, ½ cup fresh spinach, 1 scoop vanilla protein powder, ⅛ cup fresh mint leaves, 1 tablespoon almonds, 5 cubes ice, or more to taste
name: Green Protein Smoothie

directions: 1. Combine pineapple, yogurt, soy milk, cream of coconut, and ice in a blender. Blend on high for about 2 minutes. Pour mixture into a cup.
ingredients: 1 cup sliced fresh pineapple, 6 tablespoons vanilla soy yogurt (Optional), ¼ cup vanilla soy milk, 3 tablespoons cream of coconut, 3 cubes ice
name: Non-Alcoholic Vegan Pina Colada

directions: 1. Blend the basil, mango, strawberries, and water in a blender. Add sugar and ice cubes; blend again until smooth.
ingredients: 4 leaves basil, 1 cup frozen mango pieces, 5 hulled strawberries, 1 cup water, ¼ cup white sugar, or to taste, 3 cubes ice
name: Basil Strawberry Mango Smoothie

directions: 1. Blend ice in a blender until crumbly; add yogurt, milk, blueberries, and cinnamon. Blend until smooth. Taste smoothie and add desired amount of sugar; blend.
ingredients: ¼ cup ice cubes, or as desired, 1 cup low-fat vanilla yogurt, 1 cup low-fat milk, ½ cup frozen blueberries, or to taste, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 tablespoon white sugar, or to taste
name: Blueberry and Spice Smoothie

directions: 1. In a blender, combine mango, kale, almond milk, orange juice, stevia, and chia seeds. Blend until smooth.
ingredients: 1 ½ cups frozen mango cubes, 1 cup baby kale, 1 cup unsweetened almond milk, ½ cup orange juice, 2 (1 gram) packets Stevia In The Raw®, 1 tablespoon chia seeds
name: Superfood Stevia Smoothie

directions: 1. Place 1 cup blackberries, strawberries, banana, orange juice, and ice into a blender in that order, and blend on high speed until smooth, 30 seconds to 1 minute. Pour into 4 glasses and top each serving with 3 blackberries for garnish.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh blackberries, or more to taste, 5 large strawberries, hulled and halved, 1 large banana, ⅓ cup orange juice, 2 cups crushed ice, 1 teaspoon white sugar, or to taste, 12 fresh blackberries
name: 4th of July Blast Smoothie

directions: 1. Combine water, coconut milk, pineapple chunks, ice, honey, and vanilla protein powder in a blender. Blend until smooth, 1 to 2 minutes.
ingredients: ½ cup water, ½ cup reduced-fat coconut milk, ½ cup pineapple chunks, ½ cup ice cubes, 1 tablespoon honey, or more to taste, 1 scoop vanilla whey protein powder
name: Pina Colada Power Honey Smoothie

directions: 1. Blend pineapple, strawberries, cream of coconut, and vanilla extract together in a blender until smooth.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can pineapple in juice, chilled, 1 (16 ounce) package frozen strawberries, 1 (15 ounce) can cream of coconut (such as Coco Lopez®), ½ teaspoon vanilla extract
name: Easy Paradise Smoothie

directions: 1. Combine mangos, yogurt, milk, cream, confectioners' sugar, and cardamom in a blender; blend until smooth and frothy. Pour into glasses and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 ½ cups mangos - peeled, seeded, chopped, and chilled, 1 ½ cups plain yogurt, ½ cup cold milk, 2 tablespoons heavy cream, 2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar, ½ teaspoon ground cardamom
name: My Mango Lassi

directions: 1. Fill an ice cube tray with coffee and freeze 4 hours or until completely frozen. Reserve remaining chilled coffee. 2. In a blender, place 1 cup coffee ice cubes along with 3/4 cup chilled coffee, banana, creamer, coconut oil, cocoa powder, and Stevia In The Raw. Blend until smooth.
ingredients: 3 cups brewed coffee, chilled, 1 large frozen banana, ½ cup unsweetened coconut or almond creamer, 2 tablespoons coconut oil, 2 tablespoons cocoa powder, 2 (1 gram) packets Stevia In The Raw®
name: Mocha-Coco Smoothie

directions: 1. Blend all ingredients except ice in blender until smooth. 2. Add ice; blend until thickened. 3. Serve immediately.
ingredients: ½ cup skim milk, 1 tablespoon honey, ½ cup plain low fat Greek-style yogurt, 2 tablespoons KRAFT Peanut Butter with Chocolate, ½ cup pitted dark sweet cherries (fresh or frozen), 4 ice cubes
name: Chocolate Cherry Peanut Butter Smoothie

directions: 1. Place strawberries, banana, water, and yogurt in a blender; blend until smooth, gradually adding more water if a thinner smoothie is desired. Add peanut butter blend until smooth.
ingredients: 20 frozen strawberries, 1 frozen sliced banana, ½ cup water, or as desired, ¼ cup vanilla fat-free yogurt, 2 tablespoons creamy peanut butter
name: PBnJ "Workday" Smoothie

directions: 1. Place mango, peaches, orange, nectarine, orange juice, and ice into a blender. Blend for 1 minute, or until smooth.
ingredients: 3 cups diced mango, 1 ½ cups chopped fresh or frozen peaches, ¼ cup chopped orange segments, ¼ cup chopped and pitted nectarine, ½ cup orange juice, 2 cups ice
name: Mango Craze Juice Blend

directions: 1. Blend banana, yogurt, milk, cherries, and honey together in a blender until smooth.
ingredients: 1 banana, cut into chunks, ½ cup Greek yogurt, ½ cup milk, ⅓ cup frozen pitted cherries, 1 teaspoon honey, or to taste
name: Banana Cherry Smoothie

directions: 1. Place almond milk, mango, bananas, rolled oats, and acai pulp in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into 2 bowls and top with chia seeds and drizzle with maple syrup.
ingredients: 1 ¼ cups almond milk, 1 cup diced mango, 2 bananas, ½ cup rolled oats, 4 ounces frozen unsweetened acai pulp (such as Sambazon®), 1 tablespoon chia seeds, 2 teaspoons maple syrup
name: Acai Mango Smoothie Bowl
